meanings.definition: Consisting of a mixture or blend of different elements.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a mixy painting using various colors.
meanings.sent2: Her hair looked mixy with streaks of blonde and brown.
meanings.sent3: The mixy salad had a surprising combination of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The mixy music at the party blended different genres seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The mixy flavors of the dish made it a unique culinary experience.

meanings.definition: Tending to mix or blend easily with other substances.
meanings.sent1: The oil was mixy and quickly spread across the surface.
meanings.sent2: The paint was mixy, making it easy to create smooth gradients.
meanings.sent3: The mixy dough was perfect for shaping into different forms.
meanings.sent4: Her mixy personality allowed her to adapt to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The mixy fabric absorbed the dye evenly, creating a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: A mixture or blend of different elements.
meanings.sent1: She made a delicious mixy of fruits for the smoothie.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of a mixy of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The mixy of spices in the curry gave it a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: The artist's palette had a beautiful mixy of paint colors.
meanings.sent5: The mixy of scents in the room created a pleasant atmosphere.
